definition: to expose (to the air, light etc)/to leave uncovered/exposure
to air/to sun
to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
surname Lu

sentences.english: Histological examination showed 40 per cent of the thickness of the fatlayer had been removed under the exposure site.
sentences.chinese: 组织检查显示，曝露区下面脂肪层厚度减少了40%。

sentences.english: The active area scan did not reveal anything remarkable about the tray hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 有效区域扫描并不能曝露出塔盘水力学的重要信息。

sentences.english: Expose the shortcoming at the same time that is very poor to the resisting of smooth filtration.
sentences.chinese: 同时也曝露了缺点，对于平滑滤波的抵抗性很差。

sentences.english: Avoid storing in direct sunlight; it's not good for bobble.
sentences.chinese: 避免储存或曝露在直接阳光下。
